summary.p: The Stream Aggregate operator groups by a set of columns and calculates one or more aggregate expressions returned by the query, referenced elsewhere within the query, or both. This operator requires input ordered by the columns within its groups.

If the Stream Aggregate operator groups by columns, the Group By property containing this list of columns appear. If the Stream Aggregate operator computes any aggregate expressions, a list of them appears in the Defined Values property.
Stream Aggregate is a physical operator.

tr.td: Specifies the set of grouping columns.
